short_description: Effective Odor Neutralization: Crafted to neutralize unpleasant odors, this solution also removes body oils from your CPAP mask and hose surfaces while preserving their softness. Say goodbye to unwanted scents and hello to a fresher CPAP experience.

Comprehensive CPAP Cleaning Solution: Specially formulated to clean your mask, hose, and water reservoir thoroughly. It effectively eliminates residues that accumulate from regular use of your CPAP equipment, ensuring a clean and pleasant therapy session every time.

Gentle and Skin-Friendly: Protect your sensitive skin from irritation. Unlike regular soaps that may contain harsh ingredients, Snugell’s CPAP Cleaner is free from dyes, alcohol, bleach, conditioners, and moisturizers. Enjoy a cleaning solution that is kind to your skin, ensuring a comfortable and irritation-free CPAP experience.

Convenient Packaging for Regular Use: Simplify your CPAP maintenance routine with our convenient 1-pack CPAP cleaner. Each pack contains a 8.4 oz bottle of Pre-wash Solution, providing sufficient quantity to thoroughly and effectively clean your CPAP equipment on a regular basis.

Optimal Hygiene for Healthier Use: Achieve optimal hygiene and prevent the growth of mold and bacteria in your CPAP equipment. Use Snugell’s CPAP Neutralizing Pre-Wash Solution to gently rub the inside and outside surfaces of your mask, tube, and reservoir with a CPAP brush or delicate cloth. Rinse with warm water and let dry away from direct sunlight for the best results.

name: CPAP Mask Wipes, 160 Count Super Jumbo Pack, FSA/HSA Eligible, Extra Large & Moist, Unscented, Lint Free, Alcohol Free, Cleansing-Safe, Cleaning Wipes for Mask, CPAP Machine & Supplies, 1-Pack
short_description: ✅Affordable Jumbo Pack with 160 Count: Our jumbo pack includes 160 wet wipes, ideal for fulfilling your cleaning requirements for a couple of months, guaranteeing lasting cleanliness for your CPAP mask. Each CPAP mask wipe is generously sized at 7.1"x 5.5", and a single wipe is sufficient for a thorough cleaning of multiple pieces of equipment.

✅Skin Friendly: Our wipes prioritize skin-friendliness, are carefully crafted with an alcohol-free composition, and are enriched with natural aloe extract. This guarantees that your CPAP mask, tube, and machine are effectively cleaned without any risk of damage, and remain in optimal condition for prolonged use. Natural aloe extract prevents dryness or skin irritation, offering a gentle and refreshing cleaning experience.

✅Cleansing-Safe: Our wipes feature high-quality non-woven fabric, 20% viscose and 80% polyester fabrics, designed to thoroughly clean, and leave no fiber residue on the CPAP mask. This prevents potential health issues associated with inhaling fibers, providing you with a safe and hygienic experience every time you use our wipes.

✅Efficient Cleaning: Specially crafted for the unique cleaning needs of CPAP accessories and machines. The special formula, enriched with enhanced moisture, ensures efficient cleaning capabilities, effortlessly removing dust and grease to keep your CPAP equipment in top-notch condition.

✅Superior Seal Integrity: Our wipes feature a cutting-edge triple-layer seal design. The outer seal cover, inner seal sticker, and inner light-blocking film work in tandem to lock in moisture and maintain humidity, ensuring that each wipe remains fresh and effective for longer periods. Also with a convenient pull-out design, our wipes are hassle-free to pull out. Enjoy the simplicity of using a fresh, moist wipe whenever you need it.
product_description: Instructions: 1. If necessary, disconnect the mask from the tubing and remove the headgear. 2. Use a CPAP mask wipe to clean the mask cushion, frame, and any other plastic components. Ensure thorough cleaning of both the inside and outside of the mask. 3. Ensure the mask and tubing air-dry thoroughly before reconnecting. 4. Repeat this cleaning process at least once a day to maintain the cleanliness of your CPAP equipment and prevent any accumulation of dirt. 5. It's important to note that CPAP mask wipes are specifically designed for cleaning CPAP equipment, providing a convenient option for quick and easy cleaning. However, consider using soap and water at least once a month for a more comprehensive cleaning of your equipment.
